original_text: For to this end also did I write, that I might know the proof of you, whether ye be obedient in all things.
korean_text: 너희가 범사에 순종하는지 그 증거를 알고자 하여 내가 이것을 너희에게 썼노라

sentences.original_text: For to this end also did I write
sentences.korean_translation: 이 목적을 위해 내가 글을 썼노라

sentences.original_text: that I might know the proof of you
whether ye be obedient in all things
